= How to =

To join the Cities XL Mods site and be able to post new downloads and update the Wiki please send a email to [citiesxlrequests@preytontech.net citiesxlrequests@preytontech.net] with the subject of *Request to Join citiesxlmods* and the emails body does not matter, once the email is received you will have access to create new downloads within 24 hours
